=== Current Position ===
(Left is decreasing x, Right is increasing x, Up is decreasing y, Down is increasing y)
(row = 7, col = 11)
=== Last Position ===
(row = 7, col = 11)

The avatar's current position hasn't changed from the last position, indicating a possible rotation without movement. Given the layout around the avatar at (row = 7, col = 11), there are various blocks, including dirt (which can be moved), and a boulder to the right at (row = 7, col = 12). There is also a pathway down.

Since I need to make a different action after a rotation and there’s a boulder adjacent, my next logical move would be to push the boulder down (to row 8, col 12). This will help clear the area and create a path for further actions or to collect resources.

``` Action: 4 ``` 

This action will allow me to push the boulder down and potentially create pathways towards other collectibles or towards the exit.
